title: Mahomes tears ACL as Chiefs' playoff hopes end
content: Patrick Mahomes suffered a torn ACL in the closing minutes of Sunday's loss to the Chargers, an MRI confirmed. "Don't know why this had to happen," he wrote on social media. "And not going to lie, [it] hurts."

title: Source: Pack's Parsons believed to have torn ACL
content: The initial belief is that the Packers' Micah Parsons suffered a torn ACL, a source confirmed to ESPN.

title: Rivers: Return was 'blast,' but loss stings most
content: In his stunning return after nearly five full seasons in retirement, Philip Rivers started at quarterback for the Colts and positioned them to win before a late collapse by Indy in an 18-16 loss to the Seahawks on Sunday.

title: Pavia sorry for 'disrespectful' Heisman reaction
content: Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia, the Heisman Trophy runner-up, apologized Sunday for "being disrespectful" in a social media post he made after Indiana's Fernando Mendoza won the award for college football's best player.

title: Aggies shock unbeaten volleyball No. 1 Huskers
content: The NCAA women's volleyball tournament was rocked Sunday as Texas A&M upset previously unbeaten No. 1 Nebraska, sending the Aggies to the program's first final four. Hours later, Texas was the second top seed ousted on its home court, losing to Wisconsin.

title: Wiggin, coach who lost on 'The Play,' dies at 91
content: Paul Wiggin, the former Stanford and Cleveland Browns star who was on the losing end of "The Play" as the coach of star quarterback John Elway and the Cardinal, died Friday. He was 91.

title: üòà Bills roast Patriots in NFL Week 15 trolls
content: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Buffalo Bills poking fun at the New England Patriots after a huge road win.

title: Henderson and Lawrence paint playoff masterpiece; more winners and losers of Week 15
content: TreVeyon Henderson, Trevor Lawrence and Trey McBride led the way with big Week 15 performances, while Joe Burrow, Quinshon Judkins and Ladd McConkey were among the biggest disappointments.

title: NBA Cup semifinals takeaways: Spurs upset Thunder; Brunson inspires Knicks
content: The top moments, highlights from the NBA Cup semifinals in Las Vegas between the Magic and Knicks, then Spurs and Thunder.

title: John Cena takes his last bow at WWE Saturday Night's Main Event
content: After sending John Cena out on a loss, Gunther has a new 'legend killer' nickname, and young talent shines.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this season's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, redemption  chances and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Steelers color rush on 'MNF' tops NFL Week 15 uniforms
content: The NFL uniform scene in Week 15 is off to a strong start with "Thursday Night Football," but the week ends well, too.

title: Untold stories of Detroit Lions QB Jared Goff
content: Goff has a toughness that belies his California cool demeanor. Four stories that explain the Lions QB, from those who know him best.

title: To win title, Arsenal must handle pressure better
content: The Gunners made their clash with Wolves far more grueling than it needed to be, which doesn't bode well for their title aspirations.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City target Tottenham's Porro
content: Manchester City are linked with a possible move for Tottenham right back Pedro Porro. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Elderly woman found strangled to death in Nolambur
content: A 65-year-old man had tried to rob gold jewellery from the elderly woman but as she resisted him, he had strangled her

title: India cannot afford to pollute its way to prosperity: Congress
content: Delhi choked under a thick blanket of smog on December 15, with the Air Quality Index settling at 498, which falls in the higher spectrum of 'severe' category

title: Congress expels Odisha ex-MLA Mohammed Moquim for anti-party acitivities
content: Mr. Moquim has recently written a letter to former Congress President Sonia Gandhi pointing out critical phase the party was passing through and questioned ability of the current leadership in taking party forward

title: Polling underway for Panchayat, Civic bodies in Arunachal
content: Altogether, 440 candidates are contesting for 186 zilla parishad seats, while 39 are in the fray for 16 IMC wards and 21 for eight wards of the Pasighat Municipal Council (PMC)

title: Centre to bring new rural employment Bill
content: ‚ÄúViksit Bharat‚ÄîGuarantee For Rozgar And Ajeevika Mission (Gramin)‚Äù proposes to increase guaranteed workdays from 100 to 125 but increases financial burden on states and also dismantles the demand driven structure of Mahatama Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act, 2005 that it seeks to replace

title: 2025 ICTP Prize awarded to Titas Chanda, Sthitadhi Roy
content: The laureates‚Äô work is relevant to problems in keeping quantum devices, like quantum computers, under control and understanding what they do when they‚Äôre not in equilibrium

title: Haryana IPS officer's death: Shatrujeet Kapur relieved from DGP charge
content: O.P. Singh, who was given the additional charge as State police chief during Shatrujeet Kapur's absence, has been appointed as officiating DGP till further orders

title: PM Modi embarks on three-nation visit beginning with Jordan
content: Mr. Modi will hold detailed discussions with Jordanian King Abdullah II ibn Al Hussein, Prime Minister Jafar Hassan, and will also meet Crown Prince Al Hussein bin Abdullah

title: AAI's Mumbai radar to be relocated, will free land for affordable housing: Rammohan Naidu
content: Mr. Naidu on Sunday said the Civil Aviation Ministry will seek cabinet approval for the relocation so that the construction work on such projects can start at the earliest

title: NIA to file charge sheet in Pahalgam terror attack case on December 15
content: The National Investigation Agency will present a charge sheet before a NIA special court in Jammu on December 15, officials said

title: Why are OBC lists in West Bengal being scrutinised? | Explained
content: Why have communities, mainly Muslim, been recommended to be excluded from West Bengal‚Äôs Central list of Other Backward Classes? What has the National Commission for Backward Classes said? Is there a clash between the current stance of the NCBC and the erstwhile NCBC of 2011?

title: Caught in a limbo: Will these Bengaluru flyovers be thrown open to public at least in 2026?
content: A Bengalurean‚Äôs wishlist for 2026 would definitely feature completion of the much-delayed Ejipura flyover and the one on Doddaballapur Road, Yelahanka

title: Cold wave alert for four Telangana districts on December 15
content: According to IMD‚Äôs latest bulletin, cold wave conditions are very likely to prevail in isolated pockets of Adilabad, Kumaram Bheem Asifabad, Sangareddy and Medak.

title: Maternity leave turns costly for PG doctors; doctors‚Äô body seeks waiver of rejoining fee
content: Telangana Senior Residents Doctors Association flags issue, calls it unjustified and symptomatic of deeper systemic gaps in how maternity leave is handled across government medical colleges

title: RJD MP Sudhakar Singh writes to Bihar CM to set up hydroelectric projects in the Kaimur Hills
content: He asserted that¬†hydroelectric projects¬†will not only strengthen¬†Bihar‚Äôs energy self-sufficiency, but will also play a crucial role¬†in¬†environmental protection, carbon emissions reduction, employment generation for local youth, and¬†the¬†overall development of¬†the¬†Kaimur¬†region.

title: Sealdah Division‚Äôs AC local fleet leaps with rising passenger occupancy
content: Divisional Railway Manager, Sealdah Division, Rajeev Saxena said that while Krishnanagar was considered the first destination because of its historical and religious significance, the town of¬†Kalyani was considered because of the presence of a high density of educational institutions and Ranaghat for being an important commercial centre.

title: A people-led climate intelligence movement
content: A new community-driven MRV framework is bringing real-time, village-scale environmental data into Tamil Nadu‚Äôs climate governance system

title: Three emerge as probable chairperson candidates in Aluva municipality
content: Names of Saiji Jolly, deputy chairperson in the outgoing council, and Lisa Johnson, chairperson of the standing committee for public works, are among the probables for the top post along with Saniya Thomas, a two-time councillor

title: MTC‚Äôs ‚Äòbus first‚Äô campaign receives mixed response
content: Most people say buses must not be given priority as they don‚Äôt stop at designated bays, and are driven recklessly; some, however, say rash driving by other motorists puts bus drivers to hardship

title: Crossing a river into cyber slavery
content: Promises of data-entry jobs draw young men from Gujarat across the Moei river into Myanmar‚Äôs alleged cyber-fraud compounds.¬†Abhinay Deshpande¬†reports on their passage, from aspiration to captivity, and their eventual return to India

title: Sangeeta Barooah Pisharoty elected first woman president of Press Club of India
content: Ms. Pisharoty's team swept all office-bearers and managing committee positions, scoring an emphatic 21-0, in the elections held on Saturday (December 13).

title: Despite Seeman attending right wing outfit‚Äôs event, NTK leaders rule out NDA tie-up
content: Packiarasan Sethuramalingam, a close party aide of Mr. Seeman and spokesperson, says while it is true they want to send their representatives into the State Assembly, it needs to be only on their terms

title: Neither Amit Shah nor Sangh army can succeed in Tamil Nadu, says Chief Minister Stalin
content: He accuses the right wing of spreading lies and regressive ideas disguised as honey-coated pills to deceive the people. He says the ideology of the DMK is an antidote to politics of the BJP

title: Shamanur: Senior-most MLA, Lingayat leader, industrialist and more
content: Senior-most incumbent MLA in India and a Lingayat strongman of the Congress, 94-year-old Shamanur Shivashankarappa, who passed away on Sunday, will be remembered not just for the empire he built as an industrialist and educationist, but also for his politics and the work he did as president of the All India Veerashaiva Lingayat Mahasabha

title: Tamil kings, freedom fighters didn‚Äôt get due recognition earlier: Vice-President
content: The V-P releases a commemorative postage stamp honouring Emperor Perumbidugu Mutharaiyar II; lauds government efforts recognising unsung heroes essential to revive nation‚Äôs cultural pride

title: Priyanka Gandhi dares the BJP to contest a fair election using ballot paper
content: The Congress MP said youth are driven towards substance abuse and betting apps because of unemployment; alleges a PMO official to be involved in betting scam but doesn‚Äôt name anyone.

title: M.P. Minister Vijay Shah stirs a fresh furore with comments on Ladli Behna scheme
content: The minister issued directions that beneficiary women should felicitate Chief Minister Mohan Yadav in a special ceremony

title: Jaishankar meets European, U.K., Egyptian counterparts at U.A.E. summit
content: The Minister was in the U.A.E. capital Abu Dhabi to attend the three-day Sir Bani Yas Forum 2025, which concluded on Sunday (December 14, 2025)

title: Congress warns Election Commissioners, threatens strict action over ‚Äòvote theft‚Äô
content: The party showcases nearly 6 crore signatures as part of its campaign against vote¬†chori;¬†senior leaders allege that vote theft is an attack on Dr. B.R. Ambedkar‚Äôs Constitution, and accuse the BJP-RSS of standing with untruth and power

title: Government plans umbrella commission in ‚Äòoverhaul‚Äô of higher education regulatory framework
content: In Bill to replace UGC, AICTE, and NCTE, Education Ministry proposes Regulatory, Accreditation, Standards Councils functioning under one 12-member Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhishthan Commission; grants-disbursal function of UGC to be ensured by Education Ministry

title: SIT records Chennithala‚Äôs statement in Sabarimala gold theft case
content: He tells media that he has informed the SIT about the alleged links between the gold theft and international antiques smugglers. He clarifies that the inputs he provided are not evidence, but information

title: AIIMS study finds no link between Covid vaccination and sudden deaths in young adults
content: Autopsy-based research shows coronary artery disease remains the leading cause; calls for targeted public health measures

title: IFFK 2025: fallout in a post-dictatorship society might be visible only as time passes, says Chilean filmmaker Pablo Larrain
content: The iconic director of films set around the Augusto Pinochet regime speaks on politics and observation in independent cinema at the 30th International Film Festival of Kerala

title: Directors of private firm booked for ‚Çπ17.5-crore real estate fraud in Bengaluru
content: The accused reportedly issued four cheques towards payment for a property measuring about 16,990 sq. ft. in Banashankari 2nd Stage. However, all cheques bounced

title: 2 held in Assam over death of 21 workers in Arunachal
content: Rescue teams have recovered 20 bodies from a 200-metre gorge near Chaglagam in Arunachal Pradesh‚Äôs Anjaw district, while two persons were arrested for illegally supplying labour to the State

title: LDF, UDF on the hunt for mayoral candidates in Kozhikode Corporation
content: The LDF will not be able to rule the Corporation without the support of at least a few councillors from either the UDF or the NDA; DCC president says UDF will put up a strong fight for the post of Mayor

title: Govt. committed to equitable development of all regions, says Excise Minister Kollu Ravindra
content: He says substantial investments are flowing into the State due to the pro-industry policies of the government

title: Veteran Congress leader Shamanur Shivashankarappa passes away at 94
content: The Karnataka Congress leader was the National president of the Akhila Bharata Veerashaiva Mahasabha and a prominent face of the Veerashaiva-Lingayat community

title: All eyes on Independent candidates in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation
content: Though BJP achieved a big win in the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, it has fallen one short of the required majority number of 51 in the council

title: Keep writing to showcase lacunae in society and record differences with majority: Jnanpith awardee Damodar Mauzo
content: Jnanpith awardee Damodar Mauzo says it is important to keep writing to showcase the lacunae in the society and to record our difference with the majority and then only an awakening was possible

title: Efftronics poised to tap emerging opportunities in diverse fields
content: Formed on December 15, 1985, ESPL is today the largest provider of data logger systems and Internet of Things (IoT)-based solutions to the Railways, and has up to 70 products in other fields

title: Post-poll LDF leadership meeting to analyse results to plot a path back to retaining power in the 2026 Assembly polls
content: LDF will examine whether campaigns on expanded social security net and achievements in infrastructure development crowded out ruling front conversations about voter-relevant local issues, pivotal to the local body polls

title: Bommai appeals not to oppose Bedti-Varada river linking project based on misconceptions
content: MP and Former Chief Minister Basavaraj Bommai has appealed to activists and seers not to oppose the Bedti and Varada river linking project based on misconceptions as the project has been revised to ensure better utilisation of water

title: Actor assault case: court questions SIT‚Äôs omission of woman whom Suni contacted as witness
content: Court finds that SIT did not cite Sreelakshmi, whom the convict Pulsar Suni contacted and messaged while he was travelling with the survivor on the fateful day.

title: Tiruchi district remains one of the top tourist destinations in  T.N.
content: Tiruchi district occupied top slot by attracting 23.09 lakh tourists in August while Madurai, which drew 21.65 tourists, remains a top draw with foreign travellers

title: Neglect of SW hostel students will not be tolerated, says Minister Savitha
content: She directs officials to provide best medical treatment to the two students of SC hostel injured in road accident in Sri Sathya Sai district

title: Deadline for completing new integrated terminal at Vijayawada airport pushed to March 31
content: Commissioning of the new terminal is likely to take two more months; currently, over 80% of the terminal has been completed, including glass work, interiors, flooring and baggage strip

title: Recovery and reconstruction in Gaza not going to be easy: Palestinian Ambassador
content: ‚ÄúMore than 90% of the people have been internally displaced. A vast majority is living in tents in this winter. The infrastructure is totally collapsed.‚Äù

title: Stop attacks on BRS workers or face retaliation: KTR to Congress
content: He along with party leaders visit the bereaved family of party worker who was killed in an attack allegedly by Congressmen recently

title: Corporators ‚Äòswitch loyalties‚Äô ahead of Nellore mayoral election
content: Biggest jolt for YSRCP came on Sunday, when party‚Äôs city president Bobbala Srinivas Yadav, who was also its floor leader in the NMC, joined TDP in the presence of MLA Sridhar Reddy

title: UDF‚Äôs victory in Erumely refuses to translate to power
content: The post of panchayat president has been reserved for an ST member, and no one from UDF‚Äôs elected panel is from the community. However, both LDF and NDA have one ST member, making them eligible to claim the post

title: Inter-IIT sports meet kicks off at IIT-Hyderabad
content: Weeklong event witnessing the participation of about 2,500 students from the 23 IITs in various sporting disciplines

title: Kerala Congress (M) alleges misinformation campaign over ‚Äôpoor electoral performance‚Äô
content: The party had rather fared well at the just-concluded local body polls, retaining 10 of 11 sitting seats in Pala municipality, it says

title: Bondi beach attack: New video captures tense police standoff, the moment shooter was neutralised ‚Äî watch
content: Tragedy struck Bondi Beach as two gunmen opened fire during a Hanukkah celebration, killing at least 15 people.  Bystanders and police bravely confronted the attackers, with one civilian disarming a gunman. Authorities are investigating the source of the weapons and potential accomplices, while the Prime Minister condemned the act as 'evil anti-Semitism'.

title: Pune: How minor brush left HR exec with a bloodied eye; 3 men chase couple's car
content: A minor road altercation on the Katraj‚ÄìDehu Road bypass escalated into a brutal attack, leaving a 28-year-old Mumbai woman with a grievous eye injury. Three men on a two-wheeler allegedly chased and pelted stones at her car after an alleged minor foot injury during an overtaking maneuver.

title: Why from Bihar & why now? BJP names Nitin Nabin working president; party signals generational shift
content: Nitin Nabin, a 45-year-old Bihar minister, has been appointed BJP's working president, positioning him to become the youngest national president. His selection, seen as a strategic move by Prime Minister Modi and Amit Shah, signals a generational shift within the party. Nabin's five-term MLA experience and organizational skills have been highlighted as key factors in his rapid ascent.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‚Äòbanned‚Äô chips behind January market rout
content: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's previous AI model launch at a lower cost had already rattled US markets and sparked concerns about China's AI progress.

title: 'Trust me': Abhishek Sharma's strong message for Shubman Gill critics
content: Abhishek Sharma backs his childhood friend Shubman Gill to overcome a T20I lean patch, expressing strong confidence in his ability to deliver match-winning performances, including at the upcoming T20 World Cup. Despite Gill's recent struggles, Sharma highlighted their long-standing partnership and his belief in Gill's potential to shine under various conditions.

title: PM Modi begins three-nation tour to Jordan, Ethiopia and Oman; what's on agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi commenced a significant three-nation tour to Jordan, Ethiopia, and Oman, countries with deep historical and contemporary ties to India. The visits, spanning December 15-18, aim to bolster bilateral relations, commemorate diplomatic milestones, and explore avenues for enhanced cooperation across various sectors, including trade and defense.

title: Rob Reiner, wife found dead at Los Angeles home; son under suspicion ‚Äî what we know
content: Actor and director Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer, were found dead in their Brentwood home on Sunday afternoon, reportedly victims of a stabbing. The Los Angeles Police Department's Robbery Homicide Division is investigating the incident, with no further details released regarding motive or circumstances.

title: AI models: Oracle founder lists 2 types, says Musk‚Äôs Tesla uses ‚Äòlow-latency‚Äô
content: Oracle founder Larry Ellison distinguished between two AI model types: those requiring real-time, low-latency decisions for applications like self-driving cars and robotics, and those where delays are acceptable, such as chatbots. He highlighted Tesla's use of local compute for immediate responses, emphasizing that both categories are crucial for AI's future.

title: Stocks to buy: What's the outlook for Nifty for this week? Check list of top picks
content: Stock market recommendations: SBI Securities' Sudeep Shah highlights BHEL and Ashok Leyland as top stock picks. Nifty shows resilience, consolidating near all-time highs, with support at 25,700. Bank Nifty, however, lags, trading sideways.

title: Who were Rob Reiner and Michele Singer? Hollywood director and wife found dead
content: Director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele Singer were reportedly found dead at their Los Angeles home, with their son Nick under suspicion. Reiner, known for directing "When Harry Met Sally" and "The Princess Bride," had a prolific career spanning acting, writing, and producing. He is survived by his children, including Nick.

title: Coding shaken by AI: Eric Schmidt sounds alarm; warns 'could be end for coders like me'
content: Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt expressed shock at AI's rapid advancement, admitting his own obsolescence after witnessing an AI autonomously generate a program. He believes AI's biggest impact lies in automating business operations, not just coding, and predicts artificial general intelligence could arrive by 2029, urging human oversight to preserve agency.

title: 'NDA never talked of killing anyone': Rijiju slams Rahul over anti-PM slogans at rally
content: Union Minister Kiren Rijiju has demanded an apology from Congress leaders Mallikarjun Kharge and Rahul Gandhi following the surfacing of videos showing party workers chanting slogans to "eliminate" Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Rijiju stated that the BJP-NDA has never threatened anyone's life and questioned the Congress's mentality.

title: Corona Remedies makes stellar entry on Dalal Street with 38% premium over issue price
content: Corona Remedies made a remarkable debut on the stock market, opening with a significant premium. The company's Rs 655-crore IPO was massively oversubscribed, attracting strong interest from institutional and retail investors alike. This robust demand reflects confidence in Corona Remedies' solid financial performance, strategic focus on key healthcare areas, and promising earnings potential.

title: Violent road attack: HR executive chased on streets, car vandalised; woman hospitalised for surgery
content: A woman suffered a severe eye injury after her car was attacked with stones by three men on a two-wheeler in Pune. The incident occurred when the car allegedly grazed one of the men's foot. Despite the victim's plea for attempted murder charges, the accused were released with notices. She remains unsure if her vision will be fully restored.

title: Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
content: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.

title: NHL Update: Connor McDavid reacts to Oilers trading Skinner, Kulak
content: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.

title: Where Does Auston Matthews Live? Inside Leafs Star‚Äôs Homes and Wealth
content: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: IND vs SA: '100 Babyyyyy!' - Mahieka's shoutout crowns Hardik's elite T20I milestone
content: Hardik Pandya achieved a significant milestone by becoming the third Indian bowler to take 100 T20I wickets. He also joined an elite global club of all-rounders with over 1,000 runs, 100 sixes, and 100 wickets in the format. His girlfriend Mahieka Sharma celebrated the achievement on Instagram.

title: Dowry or +size? UP bride calls off wedding over Rs 20L 'demand'; groom claims body-shaming
content: A wedding in Bareilly was called off after the bride alleged dowry demands of Rs 20 lakh and a car. The groom, however, claims the bride refused to marry him due to his weight and that her family staged the dowry accusation to recover expenses. Both parties have filed complaints, and police are investigating.

title: Gold price prediction today: What is the outlook for upcoming days?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are well supported, with the bias remaining on the higher side despite record highs impacting physical demand. Silver continues to outperform gold, driven by strong industrial demand and tight supplies. Key economic data this week will influence rate expectations and market volatility.

title: Rupee tumbles down to all time low of 90.58 against US dollar
content: The Indian Rupee hit an all-time low of 90.56 against the US dollar, marking its second consecutive week of record declines. This depreciation is attributed to a lack of a US trade deal, weak capital inflows, and a widening trade deficit.

title: IND vs SA: Tilak Varma breaks Virat Kohli's record - India's new run-chase hero emerges
content: Young Indian cricketer Tilak Varma has achieved a remarkable feat, surpassing Virat Kohli's average in T20I run chases. At just 23, Varma now boasts the world's best average in this crucial batting role, showcasing his exceptional composure and ability to perform under pressure. His consistent performances, particularly at number three, highlight his emergence as a formidable chase specialist for India.

title: Bondi beach mass shooting: From a Holocaust survivor to a 10-yr-old child ‚Äî who the victims were
content: A horrific antisemitic terrorist attack unfolded during a Hanukkah celebration on Sydney's Bondi Beach, claiming 16 lives. Father and son gunmen opened fire on the festive gathering, turning a joyous occasion into a massacre. Prime Minister Albanese condemned the act as striking "at the heart of the nation."

title: Bondi beach attack: Two IS flags found in car, Pak father-son duo behind carnage ‚Äî key details
content: A father and son, identified as Sajid and Naveed Akram, carried out a deadly mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach during a Jewish festival, killing 16, including gunman. Authorities declared the incident a terrorist act, with IS flags found and one attacker previously known to intelligence agencies.

title: 'Wanted some suspense': Arshdeep Singh spills story behind Suryakumar Yadav's DRS call
content: Arshdeep Singh credited simplicity and favourable Dharamsala conditions for his stellar 2/13 performance, earning him Player of the Match. He bounced back strongly after an off-day, emphasizing sticking to basics. Varun Chakaravarthy, the second fastest Indian to 50 T20I wickets, found the cold challenging but highlighted honest team discussions and focusing on strengths for their improved showing.

title: Tom Brady breaks silence with powerful message as John Cena enters final match
content: Wrestling icon John Cena is preparing for his final match. NFL legend Tom Brady sent a message acknowledging Cena's significant influence. Brady's words focused on the lives Cena touched, both inside and outside the wrestling ring. This recognition goes beyond titles and scripted moments. It celebrates Cena's consistency and accountability.

title: Squash World Cup: India claim maiden title, blank Hong Kong 3-0 in final
content: India clinched their maiden Squash World Cup title, defeating top seeds Hong Kong 3-0 in a dominant performance. Local star Joshna Chinappa led the charge, followed by decisive victories from Abhay Singh and Anahat Singh, securing a historic win for the nation on home soil. Egypt and Japan secured bronze.

title: Goa nightclub fire: CBI begins deportation process of Luthra brothers in Thailand; Indian embassy steps up coordination
content: Goa nightclub owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra have been detained in Thailand for illegal stay and are being deported to India. The Central Bureau of Investigation is in Phuket to facilitate their return following the devastating fire at their Goa nightclub, which claimed 25 lives due to alleged regulatory lapses and illegal operations.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for this week - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Motilal Oswal Financial Services has identified SBI Life and RBL Bank as top stock picks for the week of December 15, 2025. SBI Life shows strong growth in key metrics like APE and VNB, driven by product mix shifts. RBL Bank's prospects are significantly boosted by Emirates NBD's substantial investment, enhancing its financial strength and operational capabilities for future expansion.

title: Lionel Messi's Delhi itinerary: Timings, events and tickets for GOAT India tour finale
content: Football icon Lionel Messi concludes his "G.O.A.T India Tour 2025" in New Delhi today, December 15. After eventful stops in Kolkata, Hyderabad, and Mumbai, Messi will participate in an exhibition match and meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi at Arun Jaitley Stadium. The tour has featured fan interactions and football clinics for aspiring young players.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens near 26,000; BSE Sensex down over 250 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Monday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 was near 26,000, BSE Sensex was down over 250 points.

title: How much is Rey Mysterio and Angie Gutierrez's combined net worth? Income, assets & more
content: Rey Mysterio and Angie Gutierrez have amassed an estimated $11 million net worth by 2025, primarily from Rey's successful wrestling career and business ventures.  His WWE earnings, merchandise sales, and Angie's entrepreneurial pursuits contribute to their comfortable lifestyle in California, supported by wise investments and smart financial planning.

title: Don‚Äôt breathe in Delhi: 3 stations hit max AQI of 500 as toxicity hits the roof; city gasps
content: Delhi's air quality plummeted to severe levels on Sunday, with multiple stations in Wazirpur, Rohini, and Ashok Vihar recording an Air Quality Index (AQI) of 500.  Hazardous readings above 490 persisted for hours across the city, with PM2.5 concentrations reaching alarmingly high levels, posing significant health risks.

title: 'Anti-party activities': Cong expels ex-Odisha MLA; Mouqim wrote to Sonia over leadership
content: Congress expelled former MLA Mohammed Moquim for "anti-party activities" after he urged Sonia Gandhi to replace party president Mallikarjun Kharge, citing age and a need for "young leaders." Moquim's letter highlighted recent electoral defeats and questioned leadership choices, drawing criticism from party officials who suggested he join the BJP.

title: Ankita Lokhande and Vicky Jain‚Äôs family in Bilaspur face GST raid
content: Ankita Lokhande and Vicky Jain's family business faced extensive GST searches in Bilaspur, linked to a coal firm. The multi-location raids resulted in a total tax surrender of Rs. 27.5 crore from three coal trading groups. Officials suspected manipulation in tax input during the operations.

title: IND vs SA: 'Not out of form' ‚Äî Suryakumar remains defiant despite another modest outing
content: Despite a lean patch, T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav remains confident, stating he's "not out of form, definitely out of runs." India bounced back strongly after a previous loss, with bowlers like Arshdeep Singh and Varun Chakravarthy leading the charge in their seven-wicket win over South Africa. The team focused on basics to secure the victory.

title: Canada: Two Punjabi youths ambushed in car after party; one shot dead, other dies of heart attack
content: Two Punjabi students, Gurdeep Singh (27) and Ranveer Singh (19), were killed in a targeted shooting in Edmonton, Canada. The incident occurred after a party when their car was ambushed and fired upon by unidentified individuals. Police are investigating the targeted event and seeking a dark-coloured SUV.

title: Explained: How India's Test-match lengths floored South Africa in Dharamsala
content: India‚Äôs bowlers shared the spoils, with Arshdeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Varun Chakravarthy and Kuldeep Yadav claiming two wickets each, while Hardik Pandya and Shivam Dube picked up one apiece. South Africa slumped to 30/4 inside the first seven overs and were unable to recover.

title: '8 yrs, 9 months': Survivor in abduction & rape case rues Kerala actor's acquittal; slams verdict
content: The survivor in the actor abduction case expressed deep disappointment with the trial court's verdict, which acquitted actor Dileep. While grateful for the conviction of six other accused, she stated her fundamental rights were not protected and questioned the fairness of the proceedings, citing evidence tampering and a hostile court environment. She also refuted claims of knowing the prime accused.

title: Temple horror in east Delhi: Priest‚Äôs wife stabbed to death inside shrine; suspect detained
content: A priest's wife was fatally stabbed inside a Delhi temple, leading to the swift detention of a suspect. The accused claimed the priest harbored "malicious intent" towards his family, a motive the priest denies, citing recent death threats and a long-standing property dispute over the temple as potential reasons for the attack.

title: Privacy settings to 'public': Trump tightens H-1B screening; social media checks from December 15
content: US visa applicants, including H-1B workers and their families, must now make social media profiles public for enhanced screening. This directive, effective December 15, extends existing measures for students and exchange visitors. The State Department views visa decisions as national security matters, utilizing all available information to vet applicants for potential risks.

title: 3rd T20I: Seamers wreak havoc; India thrash SA by 7 wickets to go 2-1 up
content: India secured a commanding 2-1 series lead against South Africa, thanks to exceptional swing bowling from Arshdeep Singh and Harshit Rana.  The duo dismantled the Proteas' top order, restricting them to a mere 117.  Aiden Markram's valiant 61 was the lone highlight for the visitors. India's chase was then comfortably navigated, ensuring a seven-wicket victory.

title: Brown University shooting: Did ‚Äòperson of interest‚Äô Erickson serve in army? What you need to know
content: Benjamin Erickson, a 24-year-old former US Army infantryman, was named a person of interest in the Brown University shooting that killed two students and injured nine. He was arrested at a hotel after an 11-hour manhunt. Investigators are examining his ties to the university and potential mental health issues, though no charges have been filed.

title: Video: Lamborghinis, Porsches Climb Newly-Opened Cho La Pass In Sikkim
content: In a landmark moment, the Super Car Rally under the Ranbhoomi Darshan initiative, titled "Sikkim - The Silk Route Drive," reached the strategically significant Cho La Pass at an altitude of 14,672 feet along the Indo-China border on Sunday evening.

title: Bondi Beach Shooting Live Updates: India Offers Support To Australia After Antisemitic Terror Attack
content: Australia Bondi Beach Shooting LIVE Updates: At least 16 people, including a shooter, were killed, and as many as 42 others were hospitalised after 50-year-old Sajid Akram and his 24-year-old son Naveed Akram opened fire on a crowd in Sydney.

title: "Sonia Gandhi Must Say Sorry": BJP On Congress Workers' 'PM Modi's Grave' Slogans
content: Manju Lata Meena, Jaipur women's Congress district president, raised a 'kabar' (grave) slogan against PM Modi during a 'Vote Chor Gaddi Chhod' rally in Rajasthan.

title: Bihar Man Hangs 3 Daughters, 2 Sons Before Killing Himself, 2 Survive
content: Officials said Amarnath asked his five children to stand on a trunk while putting ropes around their necks.

title: 100 Flights Cancelled, 300 Delayed Due To Delhi Smog, Train Ops Hit Too
content: Airlines have urged passengers to allow additional time while planning their journey to the airport as road traffic may be slower due to the toxic haze.

title: Video: Sydney Gunman Tells Bystanders To Move Away As He Shoots At Jews
content: At least 16 people have been killed, and over 40 others, including two police officers, were injured in a shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach in Australia after two gunmen opened fire during a Hanukkah celebration.

title: 1996 Massacre Made Australia Toughen Gun Laws, Sydney Attack Prompts Relook
content: Gun licences cannot be in perpetuity, as people can be radicalised over time, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has said amid the conversation around arms control after two gunmen shot 15 people dead at a Jewish religious gathering

title: Brown Shooting Horror: Student Hid Under Bed Till 3 am, Another Feels Lucky He Bunked Class
content: Brown University, mourning two students killed during a shooting rampage Saturday, sent students home and called off final exams, classes and assignments for the fall semester.

title: Bondi Beach Shooting Raises Fresh Questions Over Australia's Gun Laws
content: Sunday's shooting at Bondi Beach, which left 15 people dead, has shaken the country's long-standing faith in that gun control system - among the world's toughest and raised new questions about whether it remains fit for purpose.

title: Hong Kong Media Tycoon Jimmy Lai Found Guilty On National Security Charges
content: Hong Kong pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai was found guilty Monday on three national security charges, a conviction rights groups denounced as a death knell for press freedoms in the Chinese financial hub.

title: Brown University Junior, Injured In 2019 Shooting, Survives 2nd Campus Crisis
content: When Brown University junior Mia Tretta's phone began buzzing with an emergency alert during finals week, she tried to convince herself it couldn't be happening again.

title: NDTV's Weekly Quiz #7: Play Now
content: Get ready for a dive into NDTV's Weekly Quiz. In this week's quiz, test your knowledge of topics like cars, cricket, movies and global affairs.

title: "Ran Under Fire": Witnesses Recall Lifeguards' Bravery During Sydney Shooting
content: A brave few dashed towards Australia's Bondi Beach as a mass shooting unfolded on Sunday night, wading through fleeing crowds to rescue children, treat the injured and confront the gunmen.

title: "Ducked, Saw Gunman's Feet": Australian Fashion Designer Recounts Beach Tragedy
content: Pip Edwards said she had been at the iconic Sydney beach with her friend Jess Engles on Sunday when gunmen opened fire, forcing them to flee and take cover.

title: Pakistani Man, Son Behind Deadly Shooting At Sydney Beach During Jewish Festival
content: Two gunmen who killed at least 15 people at a Jewish celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach in Australia were a father and son, police said on Monday.

title: Holocaust Survivor, Father Of 5, 10-Year-Old Girl Among Sydney Shooting Victims
content: Among the 15 victims of a mass shooting at Australia's Bondi Beach targeting an event marking the Jewish festival of Hanukkah on Sunday were a rabbi who was a father of five, a Holocaust survivor, and a 10-year-old-girl

title: "He's A Good Boy": Sydney Shooter's Mother In Denial Over His Terror Act
content: A day after the heinous terror attack during a Jewish festival at Sydney's Bondi Beach, Verena is still struggling to wrap her head around the events in the past 24 hours

title: 24-Year-Old Sydney Shooter Was Probed For ISIS Links In 2019: Report
content: Australia's intelligence service investigated one of the alleged gunmen in the Bondi Beach shooting for links to the Islamic State group six years ago, the national broadcaster said Monday.

title: PM Modi Embarks On Three-Nation Tour To Jordan, Ethiopia, Oman
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday departed from Delhi on a three-nation tour, beginning with a visit to Jordan at the invitation of King Abdullah II ibn Al Hussein.

title: Uttarakhand's Kavita Chand Scales Antarctica's Highest Peak Mount Vinson
content: Kavita Chand, a native of Almora in Uttarakhand, has etched her name in India's mountaineering record by successfully summiting Mount Vinson, the highest peak in Antarctica, on December 12 at 8:30 pm local time.

title: If this was Salah's Liverpool farewell, he delivered fitting end
content: Mohamed Salah's side beat Brighton 2-0 in the premier league . Salah overtook Wayne Rooney to claim the record for goal contributions by a player for a single club in the era . the 33-year-old could have added more gloss to that tally if he not spurned a glorious late opportunity .

title: Big questions from Week 15 games: Can the Rams take the 1-seed? What now for the Chiefs?
content: quarterback Patrick Mahomes left the Chiefs' loss late in the fourth quarter with a knee injury . the quarterbacks denied the Patriots a chance to clinch the AFC East title . texans and Jaguars also scored 40-plus points in dominant victories .

title: Rams' Adams injures hamstring; TNF status TBD
content: Davante Adams suffered a noncontact hamstring injury . his status for the game is in doubt . if he is not available on Thursday, the Rams will be missing "a huge part of our offense"

title: College football bowl season: MVPs for the first two bowl games of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40‚Äì38 with a two-point conversion . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway . college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: Burrow: 'Fun' comments weren't aimed at Cincy
content: a week ago, the Bengals quarterback clarified his position on where things stand in his career . he was 25-of-39 passing for 225 yards, no touchdowns and two interceptions . "my comments had nothing to do with me," he said after the game .

title: What's next for Packers after Parsons, Watson injuries?
content: Xavier McKinney believes his team could be a Super Bowl contender . the Packers lost to parsons to an apparent season-ending ACL injury on sunday . he refused to believe the Packers don't have a super bowl run in them .
